title: SECLI LDN&JRS - STOP IMPERVA AGENT ON SECLI  Prod Like Environment
time_sequence: CM - DATA VALIDATION IN PROD LIKE ENV.

task_list.instruction_title:

PRD : Run [root]# systemctl stop rainit.service on lxvjrssecev303s, lxvldnsecev303s
